page.title: 18OUR PIG FARM - BALQUHIDDER
page.content: I live on a pig farm with 5 acres of land. We go by the name of Matyjasek and son and we employ one worker who has been with us for a very long time. Mr Matyjasek senior originally came from Poland and is now retired. We've roughly 100 pigs, all Landrace. They are kept in sties in a large building with a pipeline to feed them. We also have a farrowing house where pregnant pigs are taken to give birth. A sow can normally have up to 15 babies. During the next 6 months we fatten up these piglets and they go to the slaughterhouse for pork. They usually go to the slaughterhouse at Gorgie in Edinburgh but sometimes they go to Dunblane and Glasgow. We fatten them with a special type of pellets & swill which we collect from lots of places in our Bedford lorry. One of the most interesting places is Perth Prison.
